query:
INSERT INTO users (
            external_github_id,
            github_login,
            github_avatar_url,
            github_name,
            github_email,
            github_access_token,
            github_refresh_token,
            github_token_expires_at
        )
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8)
        ON CONFLICT (external_github_id) DO UPDATE SET
            github_login = $2,
            github_avatar_url = $3,
            github_name = $4,
            github_email = $5,
            github_access_token = $6,
            github_refresh_token = $7,
            github_token_expires_at = $8,
            updated_at = NOW()
        RETURNING
            user_id,
            external_github_id,
            github_login,
            github_avatar_url,
            github_name,
            github_email,
            created_at,
            updated_at
